availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah G. Devers (caldwell co., ky, resident)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, resident. Tennessee native. Married to Rutha Adeline Camper Devers in Princeton, Kentucky. Father of Almeda Devers, John M. Devers, Nancy Devers, Bryant Devers, Houston Devers, and Marion Devers. Resident in Caldwell County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Wayne County, Waynesboro, p. 430A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546372, p. 74.
KYR-0001-020-0019.
